languages.text: Полет мой стремителен. Я вырезал из своего тела все лишнее и атавистическое, чтобы потоки воздуха несли его подобно снаряду осколочной винтовки. Увы, в этой телесной легкости лежит и моя слабость — даже малое препятствие может сбить меня с траектории. Но добыча моя и не помышляет, насколько уязвим я в полете.

My flight is swift. Everything unnecessary and atavistic had been cut from my body so that air currents carry it like a projectile from a splinter rifle. Alas, this is also my weakness: I am so light, even a small obstacle can throw me off course. But the Prey has no idea how vulnerable I am in flight.
languages.original_text: Полет мой стремителен. Я вырезал из своего тела все лишнее и атавистическое, чтобы потоки воздуха несли его подобно снаряду осколочной винтовки. Увы, в этой телесной легкости лежит и моя слабость — даже малое препятствие может сбить меня с траектории. Но добыча моя и не помышляет, насколько уязвим я в полете.

traits.locale_text: My flight is swift. Everything unnecessary and atavistic had been cut from my body so that air currents would carry it like a projectile from the Splinter Rifle. Alas, this is also my weakness — I am so light that even a small obstacle can throw me off course. But the Prey has no idea how vulnerable I am during the flight.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 私の飛行スピードは速い。体からは不必要なもの、忌まわしいものがすべて切り取られているため、スプリンターライフルの弾丸のように気流が運んでくれる。残念なことに、これは私の弱点でもある。私はとても軽いので、小さな障害物でもコースから外れてしまう。しかし獲物は、飛行中の私がどれほど脆弱であるかを知らない。
languages.original_text: My flight is swift. Everything unnecessary and atavistic had been cut from my body so that air currents carry it like a projectile from a splinter rifle. Alas, this is also my weakness: I am so light, even a small obstacle can throw me off course. But the Prey has no idea how vulnerable I am in flight.

traits.locale_text: 私の飛行スピードは速い。体からは不必要なもの、忌まわしいものがすべて切り取られているため、スプリンターライフルの弾丸のように気流が運んでくれる。残念なことに、これは私の弱点でもある。私はとても軽いので、小さな障害物でもコースから外れてしまう。しかし獲物は、飛行中の私がどれほど脆弱であるかを知らない。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 飞行的过程非常流畅。我的身体经过了改造，所有不适合飞行的原始部分都被切掉了，这样气流就可以轻轻松松地将我托起，就像毒晶步枪的弹丸一样。遗憾的是，这也同样是我的弱点。我的重量太轻，哪怕被一丁点障碍阻挡，就会偏离轨道。不过，猎物绝对不知道我在飞行的过程中有多么脆弱。
languages.original_text: My flight is swift. Everything unnecessary and atavistic had been cut from my body so that air currents carry it like a projectile from a splinter rifle. Alas, this is also my weakness: I am so light, even a small obstacle can throw me off course. But the Prey has no idea how vulnerable I am in flight.

traits.locale_text: 飞行的过程非常流畅。我的身体经过了改造，所有不适合飞行的原始部分都被切掉了，这样气流就可以轻轻松松地将我托起，就像分裂步枪的弹丸一样。遗憾的是，这也同样是我的弱点。我的重量太轻，哪怕被一丁点障碍阻挡，就会偏离轨道。不过，猎物绝对不知道我在飞行的过程中有多么脆弱。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Mi vuelo es veloz. Todo lo innecesario y atávico ha sido eliminado de mi cuerpo para que las corrientes de aire lo transporten como el proyectil de un rifle cristalino. Desgraciadamente, esa es también mi debilidad. Soy tan ligero que hasta un obstáculo menor puede desequilibrarme, pero la presa no es consciente de lo vulnerable que soy mientras vuelo.
languages.original_text: My flight is swift. Everything unnecessary and atavistic had been cut from my body so that air currents carry it like a projectile from a splinter rifle. Alas, this is also my weakness: I am so light, even a small obstacle can throw me off course. But the Prey has no idea how vulnerable I am in flight.

traits.locale_text: Mi vuelo es veloz. Todo lo innecesario y atávico ha sido eliminado de mi cuerpo para que las corrientes de aire lo transporten como el proyectil de un rifle cristalino. Desgraciadamente, esa es también mi debilidad. Soy tan ligero que hasta un obstáculo menor puede desequilibrarme, pero la presa no es consciente de mi vulnerabilidad durante el vuelo.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Mein Flug ist schnell. Alles Unnötige und Atavistische ist von meinem Körper weggeschnitten worden, damit Luftströmungen ihn tragen wie ein Projektil aus dem Splittergewehr. Doch das ist auch meine Schwäche: Ich bin so leicht. Schon das kleinste Hindernis kann mich vom Kurs abbringen. Doch die Beute weiß nicht, wie verletzlich ich im Flug bin.
languages.original_text: My flight is swift. Everything unnecessary and atavistic had been cut from my body so that air currents carry it like a projectile from a splinter rifle. Alas, this is also my weakness: I am so light, even a small obstacle can throw me off course. But the Prey has no idea how vulnerable I am in flight.

traits.locale_text: Mein Flug ist schnell. Alles Unnötige und Atavistische ist von meinem Körper weggeschnitten worden, damit Luftströmungen ihn tragen wie ein Projektil aus dem Splittergewehr. Doch das ist auch meine Schwäche: Ich bin so leicht. Schon das kleinste Hindernis kann mich vom Kurs abbringen. Doch die Beute weiß nicht, wie verletzlich ich im Flug bin.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Mon vol est agile. Tout ce qui n'était pas nécessaire à mon corps lui a été retiré de façon à ce qu'il puisse être porté par les courants tel un projectile de fusil éclateur. Hélas, il n'y a pas que des avantages : je suis tellement léger que même les obstacles les plus insignifiants peuvent me dévier de ma trajectoire. Heureusement pour moi, la proie ignore à quel point je suis vulnérable dans les airs.
languages.original_text: My flight is swift. Everything unnecessary and atavistic had been cut from my body so that air currents carry it like a projectile from a splinter rifle. Alas, this is also my weakness: I am so light, even a small obstacle can throw me off course. But the Prey has no idea how vulnerable I am in flight.

traits.locale_text: Mon vol est agile. Tout ce qui n'était pas nécessaire à mon corps lui a été retiré de façon à ce qu'il puisse être porté par les courants tel un projectile de fusil éclateur. Hélas, il n'y a pas que des avantages : je suis tellement léger que même les obstacles les plus insignifiants peuvent me dévier de ma trajectoire. Heureusement pour moi, la proie ignore à quel point je suis vulnérable dans les airs.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Süratle uçuyorum. Her türlü gereksiz ve kalıtsal şeyin kesilip atıldığı bedenim, bir keskin nişancı tüfeğinden atılan mermi misali havada akıp gidiyor. Ancak bu, aynı zamanda benim zayıflığım... O kadar hafifim ki en ufak bir engel bile beni yolumdan çıkarabilir. Tabii uçarken ne kadar savunmasız olduğumu Avım bilmiyor.
languages.original_text: My flight is swift. Everything unnecessary and atavistic had been cut from my body so that air currents carry it like a projectile from a splinter rifle. Alas, this is also my weakness: I am so light, even a small obstacle can throw me off course. But the Prey has no idea how vulnerable I am in flight.

traits.locale_text: Süratli bir şekilde uçuyorum. Her türlü gereksiz ve kalıtsal şeyin kesilip atıldığı bedenim, bir keskin nişancı tüfeğinden çıkan atış misali havada akıp gidiyor. Ancak bu benim zayıflığım da aynı zamanda: O kadar hafifim ki en ufak bir engel beni yolumdan çıkarabilir. Ancak uçuş sırasında ne kadar savunmasız olduğum konusunda Av'ın bir fikri yok.
traits.speaker: Player
